attributes.action: Make car insurance policies and rules the same as Europe, at least roughly.
attributes.additional_details: Cost of living these days is incredible these days and insurance is just adding on to it more, especially for young drivers, by changing this, more people will be able to afford getting a car and insuring it therefore people will find it easier to get jobs, will want to commute more leading to them using petrol, diesel or electricity which is paid so this will also help the governments economy, making everyone money!
attributes.background: Make car insurance suitable and more affordable for everyone, in most of europe, any car with an insurance policy can be driven by pretty much everyone with a license, no need to be a named driver, also insurance is just a lot cheaper everywhere else

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for the insurance policies that people choose to purchase. It is already possible for people to insure a car, as opposed to an individual driver. 

We could accept a petition calling for the Government to set a cap for the cost of car insurance, if that's something that you'd like to see.
